modules.name: F & J Keys
modules.focus: Without looking at the keyboard, rest your index fingers on the F and J key. You will be able to find them by feeling for the bump on the keys!

modules.name: D & K Keys
modules.focus: Rest your middle fingers on the D and K keys. Again, you shouldn't need to look at the keyboard; these keys are next to the F and J keys, where you should already have your index fingers!

modules.name: S & L Keys
modules.focus: Without looking at the keyboard, rest your ring fingers on the S and L keys, next to your middle fingers.

modules.name: A & ; Keys
modules.focus: Without looking at the keyboard, rest your pinky fingers on the A and ; keys, next to your ring fingers.

modules.name: G & H Keys
modules.focus: You will see that the G and H keys are to the left and right of the F and J keys respectively. Your index fingers should always rest on the F and J keys, but can move to press the G and H keys when needed.

modules.name: Home Row
modules.focus: You should now be familiar with the home row. Put your skills to the test! Try and complete these exercises without looking at the keyboard.
